entry.title: Best Books on Forensic Medicine
entry.content:
Following are some of the best books on Forensic Medicine. All time classics and updated versions included.

Essentials of Forensic Medicine and Toxicology -Reddy.

The Essentials of Forensic Medicine and Toxicology is a time-tested most authentic, classical and popular textbook of Forensic Medicine and Toxicology.

The Essentials of Forensic Medicine and Toxicology 33rd Edition, authored by Dr. K. S. Narayan Reddy and Dr. O. P. Murthy, provides students with a comprehensive coverage of the subject. It is essential for undergraduate medical students who want to have a better understanding of the subject.

It has no parallel and still is in high demand by undergraduates, postgraduates, teachers, lawyers and researchers in Asian Countries. This current 34th edition has been updated, revised and 150 classical color photographs have been added to make the subject easier.

Bookdeals – Amazon, Flipkart

Gautam Biswas – Review of Medicine and Toxicology.

Magic bullet format has been used for easy understanding and quick revision
• It covers all the topics required for theory, viva-voce and practical
• Line-diagrams, flow charts, boxes, tables and differentiations have been added wherever possible to make the subject interesting, easy to understand, clear the concepts, recollect and reproduce during examinations
• Color plates for poisons for easy identification, and some of the line-diagrams are colored for better understanding
• Questions are given at the end of each chapter which are divided into Must know and Desirable to know followed by latest topic wise MCQs given from previous PG entrance examination.
• All the chapters have been revised and updated. Various new Acts (The Juvenile Justice Act, 2015; The Mental Healthcare Act, 2017; The HIV and AIDS Act, 2017; The Criminal Law Ordinance, 2018) have been added
• Some older terminologies and concepts have been removed and newer ones introduced
• Mnemonics have been included for easy recollection and reproduction
• Recent advances (skeletal age assessment, time since death, diagnosis and treatment of various poisons, etc.) have been incorporated wherever required
• Important sections of IPC, CrPC and IEA are given in a single table
• Application of nano-medicine in toxicology has been highlighted in some of the chapters

Bookdeals – Amazon, Flipkart

Textbook of Forensic Medicine and Toxicology by Dr. V V Pillay.

Bookdeals – Amazon

Forensic Medicine and Toxicology by Dr. P.C.Ignatius.

The book reflects the immense practical experience of the author. The recent advancements have been truly and correctly depicted.

It is very interesting to note that at the end of most of the chapters, questions on the topic, The answers of which are clearly discernible from the chapters, have been given.

This book is no doubt, a valuable asset.

This book is primarily meant for undergraduate and postgraduate students of Forensic Medicine most up-to-date book on medical jurisprudence and Toxicology for medical, law, Ayurveda students and experts latest developments including virtopsy, mental healthcare Act and other recent amendments are included theory and viva voce questions are given after each Chapter and multiple choice questions at the end of the book (section IV).

Bookdeals – Amazon

Synopsis of Forensic Medicine and toxicology, Handbook of Forensic Medicine and toxicology – Reddy.

A time-tested most authentic, classical and popular condensed synopsis of forensic medicine and toxicology for busy students.

This current 29th edition has been updated and revised. 150 classical colour photographs have been added to make the subject easier. High demand by undergraduates, postgraduates, teachers, lawyers and researchers in Asian countries.

Bookdeals – Flipkart

Modi – A Textbook of Medical Jurisprudence and Toxicology.

Modi A Textbook of Medical Jurisprudence and Toxicology reigns supreme in its field since its first edition in 1920. It is a well-established, specialized and highly recommended text on Medical Jurisprudence and Toxicology.

The present twenty-fifth edition of this monumental work is revised by Justice K Kannan, a noted Judge and a renowned scholar, in collaboration with specialist contributors from diverse fields. Retaining the flavour of Modi’s pristine brilliance, this thoroughly revised edition traces comprehensively all major developments in the field of law and forensic medicine.

In this revised edition, references to obsolete medical literature have been weeded out and several chapters have been rewritten in light of latest scientific advancements.

Medico-legal aspects of rape have been re-examined, keeping in mind the concerns of academic community on sensitive gender issues. The section on Toxicology has been extensively updated to make it more useful to forensic scientists and analytical chemists.

The present edition will prove to be helpful in understanding both the complexities and the nuances of the subject and its practical application. The book is an essential reference for medical and legal professionals, forensic medicine experts, judges, law enforcement and investigating agencies, teachers, scholars, legislators and social scientists.

Bookdeals – Amazon, Flipkart

Principle of Forensic Medicine and Toxicology by Rajesh Bardale.

  • Well-referenced text.
  • Some of the topics have been updated extensively, like consent, negligence, ethical aspects, legal procedures, etc.
  • Important points are highlighted in colored boxes and in bold fonts for last minute revision.
  • Numerous judgements delivered by honorable Supreme Court of India have been included.
  • Includes Mnemonics for better learning and memorizing.
  • New chapter on Forensic Osteology added to cater theoretical and practical aspects.
  • Updated content on Autopsy Findings, Laboratory Findings, Internal Examination, External Examination, Pathophysiology and Medicolegal Importance.
  • Addition of numerous photographs, line diagrams, flowcharts, tables and boxes.
  • Numerous website addresses are provided so that the curious learners can visit and learn more.
  • Designed in an easy and practical manner for undergraduates and PG aspirants and budding doctors.

Bookdeals – Flipkart

Honorable mentions

Offer link for all following books – Amazon

  • Exam Preparatory Manual for Undergraduates: Forensic Medicine & Toxicology – Dekal V
  • PARIKHS TEXTBOOK OF MEDICAL JURISPRUDENCE FORENSIC MEDICINE AND TOXICOLOGY FOR CLASSROOMS AND COURTROOMS 8ED – SUBRAHMANYAM B.V
  • Forensic Medicine: Prep Manual for Undergraduates Paperback – 22 June 2016
  • Review of Forensic Medicine, 7/e Paperback – 1 January 2018
  • Essentials of Forensic Medicine and Toxicology, 1st Edition Paperback – 15 February 2019
  • Forensic Medicine & Toxicology Practical Manual, 1st Edition Paperback – 31 January 2018
  • Forensic Medicine Solved Question Papers Paperback – 1 January 2019
entry.summary: Best Books on Forensic Medicine. Choose one and you are good to go.

entry.title: Best Insurance officer books online in India.

link.title: Best Insurance officer books online in India.

entry.content:
Insurance officer books – If you are looking for the best books for preparing for Insurance officer jobs in companies like LIC, GIC etc. Following are some of the best books you can buy online.

Insurance industry in India is growing & there are many job opportunities.

Govt/Public sector also have strong presence in the insurance market & offers many job opportunities.

Different positions you can apply include AAO, AO, medical officer positions in one of the following companies.

Job Opportunities – Insurance officer.

LIFE INSURANCE CORPORATION OF IN INDIA.
GENERAL INSURANCE CORPORATION OF INDIA.
THE NEW INDIA ASSURANCE COMPANY LIMITED.
UNITED INDIA INSURANCE COMPANY LIMITED.THE ORIENTAL INSURANCE COMPANY LIMITED.
NATIONAL INSURANCE COMPANY LIMITED.
AGRICULTURE INSURANCE COMPANY OF INDIA LIMITED

What to learn – Preparing for Insurance officer Exam.

Questions in many of these exams are not even related to insurance industry anyway. But following list of recommended books for Insurance officer exam preparation focus mainly on insurance officer exam preparation.

Book recommendations -Best Insurance officer books online in India.

  • General Insurance Companies: Administrative Officer (Preliminary & Main) Exam Guide.

This comprehensive book is specially developed for the candidates of General Insurance Companies (National Insurance Co. Ltd., United India Insurance Co. Ltd., The Oriental Insurance Co. Ltd., The New India Assurance Co. Ltd.) Administrative Officer (Generalist & Specialist) recruitment exam.

This book includes Previous Years Papers (Solved) & Study Material for the purpose of practice of questions based on the latest pattern of the examination. Detailed Explanatory Answers have also been provided for the selected questions for Better Understanding of the Candidates.

Buy this book – Amazon

  • Kiran’s LIC AAO (Assistant Administrative Officer) Online Exam Mock Test.

Kiran’s LIC AAO ( Assistant Administrative Officer) Online Exam Mock Test Hindi With Previous Years’ Solved Papers.

Total 14 Sets Content:

  • Current Articles 10 Model Practice Sets
  • Subject:
  • Reasoning Ability
  • Quantitative Aptitude
  • General Knowledge, Current Affairs
  • Computer Knowledge
  • English Language

04 Model Solved Papers

Set-11: LIC Assistant Administrative Officer (AAO) Exam, 12.05.2013 Set -12: LIC Assistant Administrative Officer (AAO) Online Exam, 22.03.2015 Set -13: LIC Assistant Administrative Officer (AAO) online exam, 05.03.2016 Set -14: LIC Assistant Administrative Officer (AAO) online exam, 06.03.2016.

  • LIC – ADO (Apprentice Development Officers) Exam Guide

This comprehensive book is specially developed for the candidates of Life Insurance Corporation of India (LIC) Apprentice Development Officers (ADO) Examination.

This book includes Study Material, Previous Paper and model paper (Solved) for the purpose of practice of questions based on the latest pattern of the examination.

Detailed Explanatory Answers have also been provided for the selected questions for Better Understanding of the Candidates.

Buy from – Amazon

  • THE NEW INDIA ASSURANCE COMPANY LTD. (GENERALIST) ADMINISTRATIVE OFFICER SCALE – 1

Specifications of The New India Assurance Company Ltd. Generalist Administrative Officers Scale 1 Recruitment Examination 2015 : Includes Practice Paper (English) 2015 Edition.

## LIC AAO (Phase-I : Preliminary) Exam Guide Paperback – 1 January 2019

This book has been specially published for the aspirants of Assistant administrative officers (Aao) in life Insurance Corporation of India (LIC) (Phase-I) Preliminary exam.

The book is highly recommended for you to study and practice with numerous solved questions provided in the book, and prepare yourself to face the exam with Confidence, Successfully.

The book comprises specialized study & Practice material with previous years’ solved papers to make you familiar with the exam pattern, The type of questions asked, and their answers.

Practice-questions have been modelled on the basis of questions asked in previous exam papers and solved by respective subject-experts. Detailed explanatory Answers have also been provided for the selected questions for Better understanding of readers.

Based on the Current pattern of exam, the book will prove very useful for study, practice and during the precious moments before the exam for reference and revision.

While the specialized study and practice material of this book is aimed to prepare you for sure success, your own intelligent study and practice, in harmony with this, will definitely ensure you a bright Career as an Assistant administrative Officer with LIC of India.
entry.summary: Insurance officer books – If you are looking for the best books for preparing for Insurance officer jobs in companies like LIC, GIC etc. Following are some of the best books you can buy online.
